projects.title: Manga Downloader
projects.description: Originally created as a final graduation project and later open-sourced for the community. A web scraper that fetches manga chapters from popular sites, indexes them, and allows conversion to PDF for download.

projects.title: Musa Bot
projects.description: A complex Discord bot based on the music fairy Musa from Winx Club, named after my Discord server. Features multi-source audio support, Spotify and YouTube/YoutubeMusic playlist integration, YouTube Resolver subdirectory that can run on lightweight machines like Raspberry Pi, various commands and message control.

projects.title: Stella Bot
projects.description: Discord bot based on Stella, the fairy of Light from Winx Club, with a creative and fun personality. Stella specializes in generating images from text using AI, featuring multiple quality levels and real-time generation via WebSocket. Future plans include meme generation and other creative content for the server.

projects.title: Image AI API
projects.description: Python REST API built to serve and manage image generation models with fallbacks between complex, medium, and fast models. Initially developed to serve Stella-bot when we want to generate higher quality images, but can be implemented in any system that needs AI image generation.

projects.title: Paladins Dynamic Overlay
projects.description: A refactored dynamic overlay for Paladins that I built for my streams back in 2018. It's now open-source and continuously updated. It retrieves match data in real time and updates the streamer's overlay based on the champion being played.

projects.title: Definitive Portfolio
projects.description: My personal website built with React and Framer Motion: featuring advanced animations, horizontal scrolling, and a responsive project carousel.

projects.title: Família Cata-Vento School
projects.description: Institutional website for a children's education school, featuring modern design and responsive layout for educational content presentation.

projects.title: Kindle Newsletter
projects.description: A simple script I created that runs daily to capture my favorite newsletter (The News), convert and send it to my Kindle. It was created as a necessary solution to a personal problem I had, completely automating the process of reading newsletters on Kindle.

projects.title: Investidor10 Scraper
projects.description: Project created to solve a personal problem: As an investor I have spreadsheets to control investments, assets, etc. I needed an API to capture asset data, so I decided to create my own by scraping the portfolio management tool I've always used: Investidor10 (Brazilian). Today this API is used in my Google Sheets through Google App Scripts.
